title: Sun in Sagittarius
summary: A period that expands horizons, purpose, and adventure. Attention moves toward meaning-making, travel of the mind or body, and commitments that feel aligned with belief.

meaning.headline: The environment rewards exploration, candor, and big-picture vision.

frames.text: With the Sun in Sagittarius, the collective tone aims at growth, learning, and honest enthusiasm.
This season favors stretching beyond the familiar to test what you believe.
Openness to risk and novelty can create momentum.

opportunities: Expanding networks across cultures or disciplines

do: Name the principle or value driving your next move.
Build flexibility into travel or learning plans.
Check scope and resources before saying yes.
Invite perspectives that widen your view.
avoid: Using blunt honesty to avoid empathy
Dropping current responsibilities for the next thrill

reusable_lines.text: This is a season for exploration, candor, and purpose-driven growth.
Aim wide, but check the map as you go.

forbidden_claims: Identity claims about being a Sagittarius
allowed_framing: Environmental focus on exploration and meaning
Agency-based choices about risk and preparation

sources: Sun in Sagittarius as collective focus on exploration and purpose
